import React from "react"; import * as Components from "./Components"; import "./login.css"; export function Login() { const [signIn, toggleSignIn] = React.useState(true); // Use descriptive variable return (
{" "} {/* Add a top-level className */} {" "} {/* Apply className */} {signIn ? ( Sign in Forgot your password? Sign In ) : ( Create Account Sign Up )} Welcome Back! To keep connected with us please login with your personal info toggleSignIn(true)}> Sign In Hello, Friend! Enter Your personal details and start journey with us toggleSignIn(false)}> Sign Up
); }
